alert.note: Alert for Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 12:22PM MST until February 11 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches with localized areas seeing up to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Wyoming, the Wyoming Black Hills. In South Dakota, the Northern Black Hills. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds could cause a decrease in visibility while snow is falling.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
